title: Broken Trinity
description: In 2007, Top Cow unleashed First Born, hailed by critics as "a quality mini-series," "required reading," and "an epic adventure." That storyline changed the Top Cow Universe forever. But that was just the beginning... Broken Trinity brings together the Witchblade, The Darkness, and The Angelus once more, but this time the stakes are even higher as a new artifact is discovered, forever upsetting the balance of power. By the conclusion of this story, two major new players will be introduced into the Top Cow Universe, while at least one established character will be gone forever!
author: Ron Marz
